com.kii.thing_if

Class KiiApp.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.kii.thing_if.KiiApp.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    KiiApp

    public static class KiiApp.Builder
extends java.lang.Object
    KiiApp Builder. Provides fine grained control on creating KiiApp instance.
    For Private/ Dedicated Kii Cloud instance users.

    Public Kii Cloud user who uses apps created on https://developer.kii.com does not need to interact with this Builder. Just use KiiApp.KiiApp(String, String, Site) is fine.

      • setSiteName

        @NonNull
public KiiApp.Builder setSiteName(@NonNull
                                           java.lang.String siteName)
        Set site name. Optional. by Default "CUSTOM" is applied. This site name should match with your Gateway Agent configuration if you interact Gateway Agent with this SDK.
        Parameters:
        siteName - site name.
        Returns:
        builder instance
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when siteName is null or empty.
